T02D3099:190b-0: @190b * // rnal 'byor pa zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byed par 'dod pas /
T02D3099:190b-1: dang por sa gzhi shin tu kha dog dkar bdag
T02D3099:190b-2: ba la thab khung zlum po rgyar khru gang zabs
T02D3099:190b-4: kha khyer sor bzhi pa dang ldan par bya ste /
T02D3099:190b-5: de la dri dkar pos byug pa dang /
T02D3099:190b-6: me tog dkar po gtor bar bya'o //
T02D3099:190b-7: de yang dbus su padma'i steng du rdo rjes mtshan pa bris te /
T02D3099:190b-8: kha khyer yang rdo rjes bskor bar bya'o//
T02D3099:190b-9: de nas thab khung du bud shing brtsig pa dang /
T02D3099:190b-10: mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams te /
T02D3099:190b-17: dkar gsum mngar gsum la gsogs pa bsags te /
T02D3099:190b-20: stan bde ba la padma'i 'dug stangs sam /
T02D3099:190b-21: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis kha shar du bltas te gnas par bya'o //
T02D3099:190b-22: de nas rang nyid sgrub thabs las 'byung ba ltar lha'i rnal 'byor byas te /
T02D3099:190b-23: de nas ma h'a sh'u n+ya dza t'a dzny'a nas /
T02D3099:190b-24: thab dang rdzas rnams stong par byas te /
T02D3099:190b-25: ram las thab khung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang du bsams te /
T02D3099:190b-26: de'i dbus su seng ge nyi ma padma'i steng du /
T02D3099:190b-27: sngar bzhin du cho ga'i yan lag gsum gyis gdugs
T02D3099:190b-28: dkar mo can 'khor dang bcas pa bskyed bar bya'o
T02D3099:191a-0: // de nas mchod pa bsang zhing byin gyis brlabs nas mdun du ye shes kyi 'khor @191a * //
T02D3099:191a-2: mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la /
T02D3099:191a-3: sreg rdzas rnams gdugs dkar mo'i snying pos bsreg par bya'o //
T02D3099:191a-4: rdzas de rnams re re yang bdun nam nyi shu
T02D3099:191a-5: rtsa gcig tu 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la 'bul
T02D3099:191a-6: lo // mthar yang mchod pas mnyes shing tshim par
T02D3099:191a-7: byas nas bzod par gsol te dge rtsar bsngos nas
T02D3099:191a-8: ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol la /
T02D3099:191a-9: dam tshig pa rang la bsdu'o //
T02D3099:191a-10: de lta bu'i zhi ba'i cho ga yang nad dang
T02D3099:191a-11: gdon la sogs pa zhi bar gyur pa de srid
T02D3099:191a-12: kyi bar du bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi
